paragraph.taxonomicName: Dikoleps micalii Agamennone, Sbrana, Nardi, Siragusa & Germana , 2020

figureCitation.captionText: Figure 2. Dikoleps micalii Agamennone, Sbrana, Nardi, Siragusa & Germana, 2020, Haifa Bay, Israel: front (A) and apical (B) views, umbilicus (C), microsculpture of body whorl (D), apical view of protoconch (E) and microsculpture of the base (F). Photograph courtesy A. Bonfitto. Scale bars: 0.2 mm (A-C); 0.05 mm (D-F).

subSubSection.paragraph: Israel • 4 spcms; Haifa Bay; 32.8211°N , 35.0196°E ; depth 11 m; 2 Aug. 2015; soft substrate; grab; NM project (samples HM27(a) and HM27(c)); size of largest specimen: H 0.7 mm, W 0.7 mm.
